      • within

        public static boolean within(int base,
                             int target,
                             int tol)
        Decides whether two numbers are within a tolerable range of each other
        Parameters:
        base - The lower numbers
        target - The higher numbers
        tol - The tolerance
        Returns:
        true if target and base are within tol of each other, false otherwise.
        Since:
        1.4.2.1
